definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]

sentences.english: The poor boy was named during a streetcar strike in New Orleans in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 窮小子在1929年新奧爾良公車罷工期間得名。

sentences.english: I read from a book that the climate in New Orleans is semitropical.
sentences.chinese: 我看過一本書說新奧爾良屬於亞熱帶氣候。

sentences.english: By now, Ogilvie was probably back in New Orleans and being interrogated.
sentences.chinese: 奧格爾維現在可能已被帶回新奧爾良，正在受審問。

sentences.english: Border Patrol Special Response Team searches a hotel room-by-room in New Orleans in response to Hurricane Katrina.
sentences.chinese: 邊境特別反映巡邏隊逐屋搜索新奧爾良的一家旅館。

sentences.english: The first steamboat to reach the city, in 1812, was appropriately called the New Orleans.
sentences.chinese: 第一艘蒸汽船於1812年抵達叫新奧爾良的城市。

sentences.english: A waitress working at the Harrahs in New Orleans.
sentences.chinese: 在新奧爾良哈蘭工作的女招待。

sentences.english: New Orleans is the home of French cuisine in America.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，紐奧爾良是法國菜的發源地。

sentences.english: We have wran days and cool nights in early spring and late autumn.
sentences.chinese: 新奧爾良的初春和晚秋白天暖和，夜間涼爽。

sentences.english: "; and "What was the name of the hurricane that flooded New Orleans in 2005?".
sentences.chinese: 2005年卷席新奧爾良的颶風叫什麼？

sentences.english: The hurricane in 2005 brought an inconceivable disaster to New Oreland.
sentences.chinese: 2005年的颶風給新奧爾良市帶來不可想象的災難。

sentences.english: Oh, I love New Orleans, but I want to go home and visit Tara.
sentences.chinese: 噢，我喜歡新奧爾良，但是我想回家並去看看桃瑞園。

sentences.english: New Orleans hosts the United States' most notorious Mardi Gras festivities.
sentences.chinese: 新奧爾良主辦美國最臭名昭著的四旬齋前狂歡節。

sentences.english: I can't believe you actually have courage to eat New Orleans drumstick for your low salary.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信你確實有膽量喫你的低工資新奧爾良雞腿。

sentences.english: And one year, I went to New Orleans for Mardi Gras.
sentences.chinese: 有一年，我去新奧爾良參加狂歡節。

sentences.english: In the early 1900s, there was a dance hall in New Orleans called The Big Easy.
sentences.chinese: 20世紀初，新奧爾良有個舞廳叫做“自由城”。

sentences.english: On a brigantine going to New Orleans.
sentences.chinese: 一條準備開往新奧爾良的雙桅船。

pinyin: Bu4 yi2 nuo4 si1 Ai4 li4 si1

definition: spicy chicken/(Internet slang) garbage (pun on 垃圾[la1 ji1])
Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)
